storyInfo: Under the indiscriminate bombardment of the city's defense artillery, Dublinn suffers heavy losses and is forced to retreat. Amiya and the Doctor's group are 'kidnapped' by mysterious figures and taken underground.

attributes.content: Gah! The lift fell over––
attributes.name: Dublinn Soldier

attributes.content: If it had been a little lower, m-my leg would've...
attributes.name: Dublinn Soldier

attributes.content: Hold on.
attributes.name: Mandragora

attributes.content: I mean, hold on to my construct!
attributes.name: Mandragora

attributes.content: You idiot... Don't drag me down too! It's hard enough to stay afloat bringing you bunch with me!
attributes.name: Mandragora

attributes.content: C-Captain... Thank you...
attributes.name: Dublinn Soldier

attributes.content: Next time, be smarter about how you run so you're less of a nuisance.
attributes.name: Mandragora

attributes.content: Watch out, Captain!
attributes.name: Dublinn Soldier

attributes.content: That's... an artillery shell?
attributes.name: Mandragora

attributes.content: No, it's far more destructive than normal artillery...
attributes.name: Mandragora

attributes.content: And, it was aimed so precisely at a small area?
attributes.name: Mandragora

attributes.content: Manfred... You've been watching us this whole time?!
attributes.name: Mandragora

attributes.content: Bloody hell, that slimy devil!
attributes.name: Mandragora

attributes.content: Alright, everyone stop right here! We don't need to chase after those Sarkaz. As for the driver...
attributes.name: Mandragora

attributes.content: He's dead.
attributes.name: Mandragora

attributes.content: This accursed place...
attributes.name: Mandragora

attributes.content: Lieutenant, wh-what is this...
attributes.name: Londinium Citizen?

attributes.content: How can the city's defense artillery do this...?
attributes.name: Londinium Citizen?

attributes.content: Londinium's wall defenses were built almost seventy years ago.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: This is the first time...
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Their cannons have been aimed... inside the city.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Not too shabby.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: Even 10% of its firepower is enough to melt ordinary structures.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: So this is Londinium's ultimate defense.
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: That was only an auxiliary cannon.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: Our weapon experts have said the main guns are able to easily penetrate the armor of any high-speed warship.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: A weapon expert...? Are you talking about the officer from the defense forces' engineering team?
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: I must thank you for capturing his wife and daughter.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: Is he still alive?
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: As long as he is of use to the Sarkaz, he will not die.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: Artilleryman, target Lift 11.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: The shot went wide.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: Unfortunate. We'll have to improve our accuracy.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: These cannons were meant to point outwards, after all.
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: Outwards... Before we entered Londinium, the defensive artillery was aimed at the ducal army outside the walls.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: When we entered the city under the guise of quelling the dukes' conflicts, they never even once thought to put us in their sights––
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: Does that count as pointing outward?
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: Since the fall of Gaul and the silence of Iberia, a long time has passed without Victoria facing any real external threat.
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: Indeed, which is why His Majesty found this opportunity for us.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: Such sophisticated weaponry should be put to greater use, rather than sitting here as ornaments adorning the doorway.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: Artilleryman, activate dynamic target tracking.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: Very good, it's working.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: We had to spend nearly a whole month to calibrate them...
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: Luckily, they seem to be working well enough.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: These weapons put us in control of everything that enters and exits Londinium.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: Once all our cannons are in place... There will be nowhere to hide under the shadow of these steel walls.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: Dublinn seems to be drawing away the artillery fire.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Is this... a test run? Is their purpose really just to calibrate...
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: No, they're ultimately unconcerned with this port.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Lieutenant, what do we do now?
attributes.name: Londinium Citizen?

attributes.content: Continue to withdraw towards the city.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: However... the rest of Sudean is no longer safe.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: The Sarkaz are tightening their grip on Londinium. As long as the city's artillery is pointed inwards, our lives are in their hands.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Unless...
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: What's your plan, Lieutenant?
attributes.name: Londinium Citizen?

attributes.content: It's nothing. Let's go, we'll talk after we've made our escape.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: These bloody walls! These bloody cannons!
attributes.name: Mandragora

attributes.content: Captain, your constructs got destroyed again...
attributes.name: Dublinn Soldier

attributes.content: I don't... have time for this!
attributes.name: Mandragora

attributes.content: Don't just stand there staring! Away with you! Get out of here!
attributes.name: Mandragora

attributes.content: Forcing us to run, eh? Mark my words, Manfred, you insult me like this today, I swear I'll...
attributes.name: Mandragora

attributes.content: Captain, that one I just saw running off that way... looked rather familiar...
attributes.name: Dublinn Soldier

attributes.content: The Lupo brunette? Is it her?!
attributes.name: Mandragora
Mandragora
attributes.content: Get her——

attributes.name: Mandragora
attributes.content: Ugh!
Be careful, Captain!
attributes.name: Dublinn Soldier

attributes.content: What have you done?!
attributes.name: Mandragora

attributes.content: I'm... protecting you... run! You still have to... find... for the Leader...
attributes.name: Dublinn Soldier

attributes.content: Fine... fine.
attributes.name: Mandragora

attributes.content: You're the thirteenth.
attributes.name: Mandragora

attributes.content: The thirteenth Taran life. I will mark you down in the Leader's place. One day, I will personally make the Sarkaz pay for each and every life.
attributes.name: Mandragora

attributes.content: General, we've routed Dublinn's team.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: I saw.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: But we couldn't find the rebels... Those sly insects! They peeked their heads out for a moment, but they vanished again after we activated the cannons.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: Uhh, could they have been killed already?
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: What do you think?
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: I... I don't think our job would be that easy.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: I'm glad you understand.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: Then, did they blend into the crowd? Should we notify the patrol so they can detain the civilians and continue the search?
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: No need.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: Continue to bombard the port. Oh, and increase the firepower.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: Increase the firepower? The port is almost completely destroyed. I can't imagine anyone would be hiding there still.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: They won't ever take this route again. Besides, have you ever seen a Sarkaz draw only half his sword?
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: Now that we've begun, why not let them see exactly what we're capable of?
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: You're putting on a show of force for them. You want... to cut off their escape and force them to come out.
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: This game of hide-and-seek has gone on long enough. Even if I don't mind waiting, the same cannot be said for His Majesty and the Royal Court.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: Doesn't matter who it is. If they have a plan, I'd like them to hurry up with it.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: Doctor, we don't have anywhere safe to hide!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Even if we all took cover under the structure, we'd still be...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: ...Vulnerable to their artillery blowing us to bits!
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: I've done some rough calculations. If those cannons are fully charged, they'd be able to shoot clean through a standard city plate! This flimsy sheet plate above our heads on the wall there won't stand a chance!
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Siege, Londinium's cannons here are serious business!
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: This is the first time I've seen them fired off on such a scale.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: That means they're rolling out the red carpet for us, right?
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: If that were the idea, we would be wiped out fifty kilometers outside the walls.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Urgh...
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Ahhh, I can't take it anymore––!
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Amiya, my drones can't reinforce these plates any further. At this rate, we're going to get blasted sky-high!
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: We need to get out of here.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Dublinn also scrambled to get away as fast as they could... but they used Arts constructs to defend themselves and left their wounded behind.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Ugh... Argh, why's our luck so rotten...?
attributes.name: Londinium Citizen

attributes.content: Are we going to die here?
attributes.name: Londinium Citizen

attributes.content: We won't leave a single Londinier behind.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Scout team, have you located the artillerymen?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Not yet...?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I'm afraid we can't find them.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Londinium's urban defense cannons, and this wall looming in front of us, have always been a single entity.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: In other words... we have no way of stopping the barrage if we can't scale the wall or get inside it?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.options: Nobody can scale a wall under fire.;We couldn't find a way inside.

attributes.content: We can't just hide here waiting to die either!
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: Why don't I run out there and try to draw their fire? With my skills, I should be able to buy a few minutes...
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: Not happening.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: If you're not letting her do it alone, then let's all go.
attributes.name: Dagda

attributes.content: Settle down, you two. Dagda, have you been hanging around Indra for so long that your brain turned to muscle?
attributes.name: Morgan

attributes.content: Hey...
attributes.name: Dagda

attributes.content: If it was as easy as getting some live bait out there, would the two of you still be here making a scene?
attributes.name: Morgan

attributes.content: Our armor could maybe take two hits from a standard crossbow. Our friends in Engineering spent months working hard to make it.
attributes.name: Morgan

attributes.content: If you're going to run out there and get yourself killed, you never should've come to Londinium in the first place!
attributes.name: Morgan

attributes.content: Alright, I get it. But I swear, I'm not letting anything happen to Vina!
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: We... haven't even been home yet!
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.options: True, there's no point in running out there.;It's too early to be saying that kind of stuff.

attributes.content: Doctor, do you have a plan?
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Drones...? Hmm, hmm, I see... Oh, so that's where you're going with it. That makes sense.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: What are you mumbling about now, Closure? The Doctor barely said two words, but you're acting like you had a whole conversation!
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: Oh, my bad. I just got an idea.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Those cannons seem pretty intelligent, and at such a long range, they can't be completely manual. They must have some way of locking onto moving targets near the ground.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: One or two guys running around won't be enough to get the cannons off our backs.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: If I deploy all my drones at once, the targeting algorithm might see them as a higher-priority threat than us and the civilians, but...
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: But there's no guarantee?
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: Well obviously, I can't promise anything!
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Closure, the reinforcement failed. The pressure is too great for the drones to withstand!
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: The base plate is going to collapse within thirty seconds...
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: We have no other choice. Let's give it a try.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: On the Doctor's signal, all operators prepare to withdraw.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Five, four, three––
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Two––
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Drones, launching!
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Run, everyone! Go, go!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Did it work?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: It bought us just enough time to move to a structure a few steps away... but this place won't last long either.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: That was our one shot, too... My precious drones have all been reduced to scrap, and even I can't just conjure up another batch.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: We can't safely move forward or retreat backwards. If we want to escape the cannon fire, we're going to have to take some risks.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I wish there were some way around all of this...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I heard you needed a guide?
Huh?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Who's there?!
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Miss Cautus, I'd like to talk to you.
But before that, I'd appreciate it if you could have your people lower their weapons.
You–– Who are you?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Let's save the introductions for later.
Claws, a machete, and this... Uhh, this hammer? Ma'am, your weapon looks plenty brilliant, but I'd appreciate it if you could keep it away from my head.
Otherwise, this friend of yours might be in danger.
––Doctor!!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.options: Huh? What happened?;......;Is he talking about me?

attributes.content: Not too close now.
One more step, and your friend's head becomes a mess on the wall.
A-Amiya, the drone...!
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: One of the drones wrapped around when we weren't paying attention, and it's locked onto the Doctor's head!
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: You sure know your stuff, Miss Pointy-Ears.
To be honest, I'm getting more and more curious about you lot.
All hands, weapons down.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: There we go, that's nice. Oh, make sure you get the message to your snipers around the corner too. I bet they haven't blinked once since I showed up.
Do as he says.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Lovely.
––Sir.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I hope you believe us when we say that we'd never move to harm a stranger unprovoked, but––
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Harm one thread on the Doctor's hood and I promise you, right here, right now, I don't need a weapon to ensure you never threaten another human being.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Ahem...
Ugh... This place is already dangerous enough. Are we seriously going to get blown up before we even start our mission?!
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Right, if we don't want the Sarkaz to turn us to dust, we don't have time to be pointing weapons at each others' heads.
Listen up, I have an idea. Please come with me, nice and easy.
I'm gonna keep borrowing your friend here until we get where we're going––

attributes.options: That's not very nice.;......;And if I refuse?

attributes.content: Sorry, but you don't get a say. Behave yourself and come along with me, my faceless friend.
